question: How does OMOP standardization benefit our AI deployment strategy?
answer: OMOP (Observational Medical Outcomes Partnership) standardization ensures your clinical data is interoperable across different AI models and research initiatives. Synapptiq transforms data from Epic, Cerner, and other systems into OMOP CDM format, enabling you to deploy AI applications trained on multi-institutional datasets. This reduces vendor lock-in and enables collaboration with academic research networks while maintaining data quality and semantic consistency.
